member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER
member.summary: Represents an extended parameter for a function that manages virtual memory.

summary.para: A value that indicates the type of the parameter.
If Type is set to MemExtendedParameterAddressRequirements, then Pointer must be a pointer to a caller-allocated structure that specifies the lowest and highest base address and alignment.
If Type is set to MemExtendedParameterNumaNode, then ULong must be set to the desired node number.

member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Pointer
member.summary: If Type is set to MemExtendedParameterAddressRequirements, then Pointer must be a pointer to a caller-allocated structure that specifies the lowest and highest base address and alignment.

member.name: MEM_EXTENDED_PARAMETER.DUMMYUNIONNAME.ULong
member.summary: If Type is set to MemExtendedParameterNumaNode, then ULong must be set to the desired node number.
